heading: Today
text: A few morning clouds north, then mostly sunny. Bitterly cold. Highs zero to 10 below north, zero to 10 above south. Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear early, then increasing clouds south to north. Very cold. Lows zero to 5 below south, 5 to 15 below north, where cold spots will drop to 25 below zero. Winds northwest near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light.

heading: Sunday
text: Any early sun north gives way to clouds. Snow developing south in the afternoon, spreading north. Remaining cold. Highs 5 to 15 above, north to south. Winds light, mainly north to northeast near 10 mph.
